content: Congrats Rahaf Harfoush — I really like this framing of emerging digital organizations and networks. I would maybe add two more concepts: the “Phyle” model coined by the Las Indias network in Spain, which I would categorized as a tighter, more institutionalized and trans-local version of the Tribe: see http://p2pfoundation.net/Phyles and http://www.guerrillatranslation.org/2014/04/24/phyles-and-the-new-communalism/the Decentralized Autonomous Organizations that are blockchain-based I understood you’re in Paris — would love to meet sometimes :) Ben
